backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with user profiles, credentials, server management, access control checks, and endpoints for creating and querying servers and profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that adds empty server and serverMembers maps when upgrading from the old actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific frontend feature to related files, components, and tests with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and state providers.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication flow, profile setup, layout rendering, and conditional overlays based on navigation state.
frontend/src/auth/authMessages.ts: Defines authentication message constants and utilities to sanitize and categorize error messages for different auth flows.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication provider managing session restoration, login, registration, logout, initialization timeouts, and backend connection state.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Handles saving, loading, validating, and clearing auth session data in localStorage with expiration handling.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Re-exports and wraps the auth context hook for accessing authentication state.
Provides a centered layout wrapper for auth pages with a title, optional description, and logo.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a channel category with support for admin-only drag-and-drop ordering and channel creation.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for creating new categories with validation, backend-guard checks, and error handling.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels in a category with type selection and mutation state handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message composer for text channels supporting sending messages, enter-to-send, and backend action restrictions.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected text channel, auto-scrolls on updates, and renders the chat composer.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with avatar, username, timestamp, and profile-click handling.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Shows public servers with search filtering and join actions.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Displays a server preview card with name, description, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the DM home view with a friends tab fallback and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a friend's avatar, name, status, and action buttons including messaging and dropdown options.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for viewing friends, pending requests, and adding friends with related actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Arranges the desktop layout with server rail, sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Determines and renders the main view based on navigation state including chat, DMs, discovery, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Implements mobile layout with sheets for servers, channels, members, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Chooses mobile or desktop shell based on window width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Displays a scrollable list of server members, fetching profiles and allowing member selection.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Renders the channel sidebar with categories, drag‑and‑drop ordering, and admin category management.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Provides a mobile top navigation bar with server, channel, member, and settings controls.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Shows the vertical server list with ordering, navigation, and a dialog to create new servers.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A dialog for first‑time profile setup, letting users confirm or edit their display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning or removing roles from a server member with async role updates.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Displays a full user profile overlay with banner, avatar, details, and optional role management.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog component for creating a server with name and description, handling backend readiness and mutation states.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Displays a server’s icon image or a fallback initial if no icon URL exists.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category, handling backend mutations and validation.
Dialog for moving a channel to another category, offering category selection and pending-state handling.
Panel for selecting a server member and viewing or managing their assigned roles through a role dialog.
Displays and formats server audit log entries with loading, error, and empty states.
Provides UI and logic for ordering text and voice channels within categories, including move-up/down actions and persisting updated ordering.
Allows viewing and editing basic server settings like description, banner, icon, and community mode.
Displays server members and their roles, lets the user select a member, view roles, and open a dialog to manage assignments.
Enables creating new roles, viewing existing roles, and accessing member role assignment tools.
Main container for server settings navigation and rendering pages like overview, roles, channels, and audit log.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Allows users to change theme and adjust text scale preferences.
Renders user profile and username settings with form state, loading states, and save handlers using query hooks.
Renders the user settings layout with navigation between profile and appearance pages and includes logout handling.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Displays backend connection status with loading, error instructions, and retry handling.
Shows a static stage channel UI listing speakers and audience with avatars and a raise-hand button.
Manages voice channel connection, participant display, and user mute/deafen controls using navigation and query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Returns a disabled state and reason for actions based on backend connection readiness.
Determines backend connection state using safe actor initialization and a simple health check with retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context for login, identity loading, and status management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Tracks window width to determine if the client is below a mobile breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Clears authentication and resets all React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for backend user profiles, usernames, and profile mutation, with error handling and backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Wraps backend actor initialization with runtime method verification and exposes loading, error, and retry state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for dark and light modes along with base styling globals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign‑in and sign‑up UI with validation, tab switching, and error handling via the auth context.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides navigation context managing current view, selected server/channel, settings panels, and category expansion state.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Handles localStorage‑backed notification overrides and utilities for checking server or channel mute status.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Stores user settings such as theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces for servers, channels, roles, messages, presence, audit logs, and related structures not generated from the backend.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Provides functions to merge and apply channel and category ordering, and to rebuild ordering structures from current state.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Implements XPath-based DOM element removal with an optional MutationObserver for continuous cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Validates hex color strings, computes luminance, and returns contrast-appropriate text colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout using Promise.race to reject if it exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with extended colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and pending feature requests related to server creation and backend alignment.
